title: Tivo SaaS Template
short: Tivo is a free HTML SaaS Landing Page template built by Inovatik.
body: ‘Tivo’ is a free HTML SaaS Landing Page template built by [Inovatik](https://inovatik.com/). Features include sticky header navigation with links that scroll seamlessly to page sections. A clean services overview and lightbox feature carousal, video modal, pricing table, testimonial slider and working forms for service sign up, log in as well as a newsletter sign up. [See more details](https://inovatik.com/tivo-saas-app-website-bootstrap-html-template.html)! ## Related Posts: * [Smash Lite Template](https://www.easeout.co/blog/2020-03-13-smash-lite-template)
